## addOne

This function adds one to its input.

### Parameters

-   `input` **[number][8]** any number

Returns **[number][8]** that number, plus one.

## DenseMatrix

A Dense matrix object

### delete

Remove content

### add

Add to the matrix

#### Parameters

-   `input` **[number][8]** some value

#### Examples

```javascript
return add(3)
```

Returns **[number][8]** added value
